analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/4/0x966ffc36048670fee053e0efd3d55c9346cbcae6.sol:
	Contract USDSVToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/4/0x966ffc36048670fee053e0efd3d55c9346cbcae6.sol#206)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/4/0x966ffc36048670fee053e0efd3d55c9346cbcae6.sol#71-72) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_tokens' of USDSVToken.approve (/unique_chucks/4/0x966ffc36048670fee053e0efd3d55c9346cbcae6.sol#155) is not in mixedCase
